## COF 13-Dimensional Analysis Framework (Mandatory Per Phase)

### Dimensional Analysis Template (Required for each [phase/operation])

```yaml
cof_dimensional_analysis:
  motivational_context:
    business_driver: "[Why this work matters to the organization]"
    success_criteria: "[How we measure achievement]"
    stakeholder_value: "[Who benefits and how]"

  relational_context:
    dependencies: "[What this work depends on]"
    influences: "[What this work affects]"
    connections: "[How this integrates with existing systems]"

  dimensional_context:
    scope: "[Breadth of impact and coverage]"
    depth: "[Level of detail and technical rigor]"
    integration: "[Cross-system and cross-team coordination]"

  situational_context:
    environment: "[Current organizational and technical state]"
    constraints: "[Limitations and boundary conditions]"
    opportunities: "[Favorable conditions and enablers]"

  resource_context:
    human_resources: "[People, skills, and availability]"
    technical_resources: "[Tools, systems, and infrastructure]"
    temporal_resources: "[Time allocation and scheduling]"

  narrative_context:
    user_journey: "[End-user experience and interaction]"
    stakeholder_story: "[Business stakeholder perspective]"
    technical_narrative: "[Implementation and maintenance story]"

  recursive_context:
    feedback_loops: "[How results inform future iterations]"
    improvement_cycles: "[Continuous enhancement mechanisms]"
    learning_capture: "[Knowledge retention and application]"

  sacred_geometry_context:
    circle_completeness: "[Full cycle coverage and closure]"
    triangle_stability: "[Three-point validation structure]"
    spiral_progression: "[Upward development with learning]"
    golden_ratio_balance: "[Optimal effort and resource distribution]"
    fractal_consistency: "[Pattern coherence across scales]"

  computational_context:
    algorithms: "[Logical processing and decision rules]"
    data_models: "[Information structure and relationships]"
    performance: "[Efficiency and scalability considerations]"

  emergent_context:
    unexpected_outcomes: "[Novel results and discoveries]"
    serendipitous_benefits: "[Unplanned positive impacts]"
    adaptive_responses: "[System evolution and self-organization]"

  temporal_context:
    scheduling: "[Timeline and milestone management]"
    sequencing: "[Order and dependency management]"
    cadence: "[Rhythm and iteration timing]"

  spatial_context:
    distribution: "[Geographic and organizational spread]"
    topology: "[Network and communication structure]"
    boundaries: "[Interface and integration points]"

  holistic_context:
    synthesis: "[Unified view across all dimensions]"
    coherence: "[Internal consistency and alignment]"
    completeness: "[Coverage and thoroughness validation]"
```


## Quality Gates and Validation

### Work Codex Compliance Validation

```yaml
codex_compliance:
  trust_verify: "[All claims have traceable evidence]"
  workspace_first: "[Existing artifacts inventoried and enhanced]"
  logs_first: "[Structured logging with correlation IDs]"
  leave_better: "[System enriched for future work]"
  fix_root: "[Root causes addressed, not symptoms]"
  best_tool: "[Tool selection optimized for context]"
  balance_flow: "[Order and flexibility appropriately balanced]"
  iteration_sacred: "[Spiral learning captured and applied]"
  context_action: "[COF analysis precedes execution]"
  resonance_proof: "[Business/user/technical harmony achieved]"
  diversity_inclusion: "[Multiple perspectives integrated]"
```

### Sacred Geometry Validation Gates

```yaml
sacred_geometry_gates:
  circle_gate:
    requirement: "[Complete cycle with closure and continuity]"
    validation: "[Start connects to finish, no gaps in coverage]"
    evidence: "[Full workflow completion with documented handoffs]"

  triangle_gate:
    requirement: "[Three-point stability and validation]"
    validation: "[Business/user/technical perspectives all addressed]"
    evidence: "[Stakeholder approval from all three domains]"

  spiral_gate:
    requirement: "[Upward progression with learning integration]"
    validation: "[Each iteration builds on previous with captured insights]"
    evidence: "[Learning artifacts and improvement documentation]"

  golden_ratio_gate:
    requirement: "[Optimal balance and resource distribution]"
    validation: "[Effort allocation follows natural proportion principles (1.618...)]"
    evidence: "[Resource optimization analysis and justification]"

  fractal_gate:
    requirement: "[Pattern consistency across all scales]"
    validation: "[Approach coherent from epic to task level]"
    evidence: "[Scale consistency documentation and validation]"
```

### UCL Enforcement Mechanisms

```yaml
ucl_enforcement:
  orphan_prevention:
    check: "[Every context has traceable parent relationship]"
    escalation: "[Orphaned contexts trigger immediate remediation]"
    resolution: "[Link to parent or justify independence with evidence]"

  cyclical_detection:
    check: "[No circular dependencies in context relationships]"
    escalation: "[Cycles trigger architectural review]"
    resolution: "[Restructure dependencies or justify cycle necessity]"

  completeness_validation:
    check: "[All contexts have complete evidence and documentation]"
    escalation: "[Incomplete contexts block phase progression]"
    resolution: "[Complete missing elements or defer with rationale]"

  [additional_law_enforcement]:
    check: "[Specific validation requirement]"
    escalation: "[What happens when violation detected]"
    resolution: "[How to remediate violation]"

  [additional_law_enforcement]:
    check: "[Specific validation requirement]"
    escalation: "[What happens when violation detected]"
    resolution: "[How to remediate violation]"
```

## Definition of Done (ContextForge-Aligned)

Every completed [operation/phase/workflow] must demonstrate:

- [ ] **COF Analysis Complete**: All 13 dimensions adequately addressed
- [ ] **UCL Compliance Verified**: No orphaned, cyclical, or incomplete contexts
- [ ] **Sacred Geometry Aligned**: All five patterns demonstrably present
- [ ] **Work Codex Integrated**: All 11 principles explicitly applied
- [ ] **Evidence Complete**: All claims have traceable evidence bundles
- [ ] **Resonance Achieved**: Business/user/technical harmony demonstrated
- [ ] **Context Hierarchy Valid**: Clear parent linkage and traceability
- [ ] **Pattern Consistency**: Fractal coherence across all scales
- [ ] **Learning Captured**: Insights documented for future iterations
- [ ] **Audit Ready**: Strategic compliance verification prepared

### ContextForge Quality Thresholds

```yaml
quality_gates:
  dimensional_depth: "[Each COF dimension analysis â‰¥ 200 words with evidence]"
  sacred_validation: "[All 5 geometric patterns explicitly validated]"
  ucl_compliance: "[100% context law requirements met]"
  evidence_traceability: "[All claims link to specific evidence sources]"
  resonance_verification: "[Business/user/technical alignment documented]"
  iteration_readiness: "[Next iteration seeded with validated learning]"
```
